list_definition.definition: a card on which a message may be sent by post, often with a picture on one side (a picture postcard)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She sent me a postcard of the Taj Mahal when she was in India.

list_ex_of_english: I can write a short, simple postcard, for example sending holiday greetings.
